responsibilities: Project management, managing retails and wholesale projects, managing delivery teams and testing team, managing the Additional responsibility included: Commercial End to End – Currently managing $16 million strategic project to Build out Sterling CRM for Small, Medium and Large Enterprise accounts for both complex and non-complex products. Managing 8 delivery teams, testing team and 3 project managers. Retail – Delivered several transformation retail gaps related to West Virginia conversion from Verizon to Frontier. The project was delivered on time and within the approved budget $1.2 million. Managed 9 delivery teams, testing team, 2 project managers and 3 trainers. Wholesale - Delivered several transformation Wholesale gaps related to West Virginia conversion from Verizon to Frontier. The project was delivered on time and within the approved budget of $4 million. Managed 10 delivery teams, testing team, 4 project managers and 5 trainers. Frontier Legacy LSR/ASR Embedded base conversion – Managed project to move the embedded base customers from Frontier LSR/ASR Online Ordering system to Synchronoss. The approved budget was $2 million and delivered the project on schedule and within the approved budget. Frontier 13 states conversion – Managed projects to support Frontier 13 conversion of customers from Verizon to Frontier which was achieved in 2 phases (phase 1- 4states and phase 2- 9 states) Automation Enhancements for Frontier 13 – Managed additional pre-order and wholesale automation enhancement Loop Make up automation - Managed the Cadtel vendor to deliver the automated engineering Loop Make up functionality. E911 Project – Managed E911 decommissioning project. Worked with external customers like ATT, IL Consolidated, Convergys, ATT SW Bell, Century Link and Wind Stream to move the existing files, jobs, programs from Mainframe to AS400. Creating, maintaining, and publishing project plans. Wholesale Projects – Delivery of several wholesale transformation gaps related to West Virginia conversion and Frontier 13 conversion which includes ASR/LSR/TA automation, embedded base projects for ASR, LSR and TA. Budget monitoring and time tracking Weekly status reporting and presentation to management.
